msbt.message: Way to go, ! Now you've got an abode to call your very own. I'm guessing your interior-design skills are as epic as your fashion sense. And I don't wanna brag, but I guess correctly almost HALF of the time, .
I'm still in awe of what you've done with your place, you know. It's a full-on mansion now! You've come a long way too. Just being seen with you in public increases my Q score.
Hey, sohave you been to Nook's Cranny lately? It's totally blowing up! The space and the selection are crazy good now! As if I don't have enough trinkets already
Did you hear? We're getting our own museum right here on , ! Surprised that I'm into it? Hey, I've always loved vintage stuff. Even before it was cool.

Finally! After all that buzz about the tailors, their shop's finally open!I'm curious to find out if it will live up to the hype, .So, How 'bout you check it out and report back with your findings, ASAP?

Have you noticed there's a path going up one of the cliffs? I bet the views from the top are spectacular! Who knows? You might even see a part of that's yet to be discovered, ! I'd make the climb myself, but as a rule, I avoid mysterious and unmarked trails.

! Did you hear that is now living right here on ? If what I heard about them is true, life on this island is about to get a lot more interesting, ! What have I heard about them? Uh, I already told you. They moved here.
